content: Alice met Bob in Paris. They discussed migrating the database. Later, Alice said to notify SRE before changes.

qas.question: Who should be notified before changes?

content: Carla purchased tickets to Madrid next week. She also booked a hotel near the Prado. Reminder: budget is 2k.
Team will split services. Payments service moves to Go; auth stays in Node. Tests must be updated.
